label: 源基綱
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1049-1117). Son of Tsunenobu. Older brother of Toshiyori. Well-known biwa player. Kanshi in Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集(2). References in Sanboku kikashū. Reader (kōshi) and possibly a judge at poetry contests. [経信、俊頼、琵琶、漢詩、散木奇歌集、講師]
